## Data Visualization Exercise
```{r message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
starwars
```
### Mass VS Weight
We will study mass vs weight relationship through a scatterplot
```{r warning=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data = starwars, aes(x = height, y = mass)) + geom_point() + labs(title = "Mass vs. height of Starwars characters",
       x = "Height (cm)", y = "Weight (kg)")
```
